column1: Local Foods////They do change up the soups seasonally
column2: and even the sandwiches and sides (although less frequently)
column3: which I really like. I always
column4: always get the Kale side because it is fantastic. I'm also a fan of their beet side. Their sides do tend to be on the sweet side
column5: so if you're not a fan of sweetness in your main course meals
column6: you might feel a little underwhelmed.
